post.body: Ah, you guys always get snow before us. My grandma said there was some in Graham this morning, but I've seen nothing.
WHAT?! JEALOUS! None in south Tacoma yet. :(
lol no, about the project for awesome, actually. :)
FUN! I like their pizza. Food always wins me over.
oh gosh, then yes, it's definitely time to sing loudly- and badly (lol that always makes me strangely happy)
I find singing loudly to those also helps. :)
OR I could tell them I'm a vampire. I'm WAY too pale for anyone to believe bronzer came anywhere near my face.
Oh, not good! You're not the only one lol. I hardly trust my judgement anymore. I ask friends to judge, if I'm interested.
HAPPY BIRTHDAY!!!
fancy!
yeah, he sent messages to Marky, Sean, and I saying that he had no problem with us. I have an idea for a collab w/all of us
that was all Marky! He was much faster than I was at fixing things (lol I'm struggling to stay awake).
Initially, the collab we just did was going to be for next week, but we could do that... I wonder if Sean would edit again
Were you all still going to take the week off?
Sleep lame?! That's crazy talk, that is.
I kept forgetting to put spaces between words, so I decided it was time to sleep... no idea why I'm still awake.
Are you still commenting?
myspace karaoke and ice cream! Obviously...
thanks
YAY! Ooo I love IHOP... I love anywhere that serves breakfast food... now I want a waffle lol
glad it went well. Do you get to eat real food now?!
...sometimes I feel like there's a weird-youtube-video-appreciation gene, and I've got the recessive alleles.
WONDERFUL cheesy Christmas movie! I may have to go watch that now!
lol wait, you can't watch Mamma Mia, but weren't you the one that recently watched The Sound of Music...?
Oh, I'm so sorry. Um...Confessions of a Shopaholic? ...eh, I haven't read for fun in a long time, so I'm bad with suggestions
One of my favorite books! I hope you like it! :)
Great resolution! I'd like to do that, but I'm going to be moving, and need stuff for an apartment...
Hmm... maybe I should stop watching for snow and actually make that video...
is confused about the SHVP video...
I love winter storms and all, but REALLY?! Do we have to have one covering the ENTIRE state the weekend I want to drive home?!
And more. Mom: "I think we're too self-absorbed to remember that" Me:"You're not supposed to admit that" Mom: "Ok, you're too self-absorbed"
Wise words from my mom: "Icy roads used to be fun. It's just not as fun to do donuts now with so many cars on the road." Lol oh dear.
Chose not to drive home today, and now it's supposed to snow there and everyone keeps saying not to drive in the snow. :( I want to go home.
bought cheap sparkly gold eyeshadow, tried it out, and now my whole face is sparkly. I think I went wrong somewhere... It's like Halloween!
My grandma just gave me a poetry book from 1907. LOVE IT! Old books make me happy. :)
My mom can't find a way to get here for Xmas. :( Trains are sold out, the passes might be closed, and road closures by the Columbia River.
MORE SNOW! I'm torn between going building a snowman and going back to sleep for a while... decisions decisions.
Hmm... not sure I've I'm going to make a P4A video. :( Still not feeling well and I have to attempt to run errands in the snow. Lame.
Ew. Creepy phone call. It was tolerable when it was strange texts, but phone calls?!
...Backstreet Boys karaoke! Probably not a good idea w/the finally disappearing sore throat, but FUN! http://tinyurl.com/6qkcuy
"I'LL NEVER BREAK YOUR HEART, I'LL NEVER MAKE YOU CRY! I'D RATHER DIE THAN LIVE WITHOUT YOU. I'LL GIVE YOU ALL OF ME, HONEY THAT'S NO LIE"
Ugh just woke up and feeling more sick than I have the past few days... I was kind of hoping it had been a fluke. Going back to sleep now.
EEEE! So much snow falling! I hope there's enough to build a snowman tomorrow!
SNOW!!!
LOVE The Curious Case of Benjamin Button! Beautifully done.
Just received my only non-sensible Christmas gifts! SO excited! LOVE non-sensible gifts!
Is searching for a route to TN that avoids mountains... WHY are there so many effing mountains?!
Considering driving to Tennessee.
Eggnog with kahlua is delicious. Oh family gatherings.
Totally smiling at nothing lol. Just talked to one of my favorite people. I missed him and his sarcasm more than I realized.
That was supposed to say "do not." Oops.
In the event of having 2+ children, do give them names that sound ALMOST the same! It makes distant cousins VERY confused.
http://twitpic.com/x1b6 - Woah. Hello, avalanche control.
I hate goodbyes and homesickness after the holidays. :(
My mom is trying to spike the hot cocoa... lol oh, Christmas.
❉ MERRY CHRISTMAS! ❆
Thrift store shopping is surprisingly exhausting. Who knew?
Making cookies and kraut runza... and NOT watching the hot neighbor out the kitchen window (I swear!)
Frosty the Janitor was a jolly, happy soul! http://tinyurl.com/8lbyqt
Okay, as much as I love how pretty it is outside, it's getting a little annoying. We're not prepared for this kind of weather!
